*SMOOCH*

"Um, why did you kiss me? Weren't you going to eat me, or something like that?" you tried to keep a serious face, but Peach just giggled at your question.

"No, I was just joking when I said that I could eat you right up, you just look so cute I wanted to give you a kiss," she explained. Afterwards, her face turned into a concerned expression, putting her silly sense of humor aside. "But, how exactly you got on this size, and most importantly, here? I have never seen, nor heard about you before..." she said as she walked across the castle halls, still holding you on her gloved hands.

"Well, I've been spending the day playing on my Nintendo Wii..." you said, trying to omit the fact that you were playing the game they were on right now.

"Oh, so you must be from Earth, then!" she said, kind of surprising you on how she was self-aware that she was a video-game character. However, before you could ask, she got to the main square of the castle, where Toadsworth and two other Toads were standing, noticing the princess. "Oh, good morning, all," she said.

"Morning, your highness!" the three Toads responded. However, Toadsworth noticed the odd way that Peach held her hand, and inched closer.

"Dear Princess, may I ask if you are holding something?" he asked.

"Well, I was going to show you three this..." she responded. You weren't sure how Toadsworth would react to, neither you did about the Toads. Expectingly awaiting a response, the universe answered you, as Toadsworth replies.

"Yeah, that's what I wondered, too. I was asking him how he got here, and he said he was playing on his Nintendo Wii before he got warped here," explained the princess.

"But how do you think we can get him to normal size, and most importantly, back to Earth?" one of the Toads asked. You were about to tell them that you saw a painting of your room and that you could jump on it, but you were interrupted by the other Toad.

"Maybe Professor E. Gadd knows! He's on the castle laborotories right now," said one of the Toads.

"Um..." you spoke up, to get the others' attention. "While I think E. Gadd can fidugre out why I got here, I don't think he may be able to get me back to normal size. Besides, there is a painting of my room past that hall. I can just go through it like in Super Mario 64 and I'll be home," you said. But Peach then shook her head no.

"Sorry, little guy, but when Mario got the 120 Power Stars and defeated Bowser to rescue me then, the power of the stars sealed away the ability to go through paintings, so it won't be that easy," she said, causing you to sigh in dejection.

"Princess, wasn't Starlow comming here again to discuss about a certain matter of converting the old Fawful Express tracks into routes for shipping products towards other kingdoms by train? We could ask her if she could try to help the shrunken gentleman," noted Toadsworth.

"Yes, I believe she and another representative of the Star Sprites were comming here, though it will take some time until they arrive," replied Princess Peach. She lifted you up for you to face her. "Well, would you want to spend the time with the Professor to see if he can help you in the meantime, or..." she asked you.

Well, in one hand, being with Professor E. Gadd, while it might not help you grow to full size or get home, but at least it might reveal some points, such as how you got here in first place, though it might not be a safe experience. Hanging with the Princess and the others is safer and may even give you a chance to meet the Mario Bros., but it might be actually kind of boring. Well, what will it be?

"Why this is my new friend Toadsworth, he is called....oh to tell the truth I never even asked you your name!" The pretty Mushroom Princess gasped as she continued to hold onto you gently.

121121.title: Digestion? Not Today!

1211212.content:
"Peach!! LET ME OUT!!"

It seems that your screaming and struggling are getting you nowhere. The organic prison that is Princess Peach's stomach begins to gurgle and groan around you, putting a halt to your escape attempt. Suddenly, your surroundings wobble even more violently. You lose your balance and tumble into the digestive juices.

On the outside, Peach is giggling and swaying her torso from side to side, sloshing you around inside her. She seems to enjoy having you at the mercy of her digestive process. With a merry sigh, the Princess gently rubs her stomach, then walks off toward her bedroom to sleep off her snack.

You, on the other hand, are in searing pain due to the stomach acid you're floating in. However, you've used up all your strength beating at the stomach walls earlier. Drained of all hope and might, you fade into unconsciousness...

...

After what feels like an eternity, you slowly awaken looking at what appears to be a ceiling of a room. A bedroom, specifically. You peer around in place and notice that this area looks nothing like the innards of the Princess! You then look up and notice Peach's sleeping face, though from your viewpoint it's upside-down. Does this mean you've been freed somehow? Are you back to your normal self?

Nope.

You try to run, but no movement occurs. Next you try moving your arms...but that doesn't do anything either! You can't even see your physical body...what gives?

"Peach?" you attempt to speak, but nothing comes out that the sleeping woman can hear! This is certainly weird...

After a few minutes or so, Peach's eyes slowly open, and with a brief yawn she adjusts her position so that she's sitting up on her bed. For some reason, YOU feel the movement of her abdomen as she sits up. But why is this so?

Peach, wearing only her pink bra and undies, gets out of the bed and walks over to face a mirror in the room. Your sight is level with the reflection of her slim, bare tummy. The Princess then pats her tummy, and strangely enough, you feel this, too.

"That tiny man was delicious!" says Peach to herself. "I wonder where his nutrients ended up..."

Wait a minute. Unable to move? Unable to speak? Feeling the impact of Peach patting her stomach? This must mean...you've been digested completely and absorbed into her abdominal muscles! You can't see your physical body, because you no longer HAVE a physical body! Your consciousness is permanently trapped within the torso of Princess Peach. No matter how badly you wish you were a normal-sized human again, you will feel the force of this gal rubbing her belly and digesting what she eats for the rest of her life. You're one with her now, and there's nothing you can do about it.

At that point, you noticed the books that had all been crammed into the box, some of which had bite marks on them. You figured that Nowi had been playing with them. You felt the box get picked up, but Nowi tried to stop her, and her hand was placed under the hole.
134212222222211.title: Hide and Seek

1342122222222112.content:
Nowi must've felt you, because she looked down at her hand and saw you right away. As Tharja left, Nowi cried out, "FOUND YOU! Boy am I starving." You desperately pleaded with the dragon, but you were ignored. At that point, she gently threw you into her mouth. You felt yourself being pushed around by her tongue, before being pushed to the back of the mouth. At that point, you lost consciousness, and never woke up again.
Outside Nowi thought, "Hmm, people taste really good. Maybe I should ask Tharja for a spell that will shrink them down to an edible size, or maybe one that will make me grow, that way I won't have to change to dragon form when I want a full-sized person.

One Year Later
Humans have become an endangered species. Nowi got the growth spell she wanted, and began to rampage through the countryside, eating everyone and everything in sight. You can count the number of remaining settlements on one hand, and the dragon goddess is far from sated even when she eats twenty villages a day. There is nowhere to hide from her gaping jaws.
1342122222222112.title: You jump into Nowi's hand.

13421222222222.content: What about the Evil Aversa? Right hand to Validar (and Gangrel before his death)
13421222222222.title: Aversa

134212222222222.content: What about Tharja, the Grimleal dark mage who ''Has nicest body in the army'' according to her Japanese roster
134212222222222.title: Dark & sexy witch!

1342122222222221.content:
You slowly and groggily awaken in a rather dark place. Potions, tomes and other magical things can be seen on shelves — the elixirs and a brewing cauldron are the only things illuminating the area currently. But...something’s definitely not right. As you gaze at the great brew before you, everything seems much bigger than it should be.

Or...are you just tiny?

Last you remember, you were playing Fire Emblem Awakening on your 3DS, and now, here you are, about an inch tall (maybe even less) in a spooky-looking sanctum. Turning around, you gasp at the astonishing sight of a giantess peering down at you. Her dark hair, revealing outfit, lovely body, and affinity for the dark arts allows your mind to piece everything together. This giantess is none other than Tharja, the Plegian dark mage who seems just a bit too attached to Robin of the Shepherds.

“Hello, little man...” Tharja greets, almost seductively.

“Um...hello...” you reply nervously. “How did I...get here? And why am I so small?”

What is Tharja’s answer?
1342122222222221.title: The Dark Witch

choices: "...I'll look for a spell to help you with your size."
"...I want to have some fun with you!"
13421222222222212.content:
"Even I am not quite certain..." Tharja answers truthfully.

With a sad sigh, you respond to the dark witch. "I understand...but how will I get home, then?"

Tharja ponders for a moment before her reply. "I don't know the answer to that either, little one. I assume you're not from this world?"

You blush, not wanting to reveal the truth about Tharja's existence as a game character. "Nope."

"Hmm...well, until we find a way to return you to your home world, you're welcome to stay with me. It may be too dangerous for a tiny person like you to wander alone..."

You have to admit, Tharja's logic is on point. "R-right..."

A smirk creeps onto the possessive mage's lips. "In the meantime..."
13421222222222212.title: In Tharja's Care

choices: Yes! This is what I was looking for!
1342122222222222.content: How about Lucina? Surely you want her to find you.
1342122222222222.title: Daughter of Chrom?

13421222222222221.content:
You wake up in what appears to be a tent. Everything around you looks huge! Or...are you just...shrunken? Suddenly, you notice a pair of dark blue boots in fromt of you! Looking up, you see the rest of the figure...a female figure. Blue hair, golden tiara...flat chest?

"Marth?" You think to yourself, before quickly recanting that thought. "Wait...it's Lucina!"

"Hm?" Lucina reacts to the sight of a tiny creature. "An insect? ...no...it looks...human!" The giantess scoops you up into her hand before you can even think about running. "A tiny person! Unbelievable! Who are you? And how are you so small?"

You are in a pickle now. How could you inform Lucina of her existence as a mere video game character? An angry giantess is not something you're prepared to face. You begin to think up a ruse, when...

"Lucina?"

You don't quite remember for sure whose voice that is...does it belong to Robin or Chrom? Wait, nevermind that! Lucina needs you out of their sight! She hides you...
13421222222222221.title: The Future is Not Written

choices: Nope, her mother still creeps me out (:C)
13421222222222222.content: How about Noire? She cute...and very dangerous with a bow,,,and cute...
13421222222222222.title: Cute Girl With Mommy an Personality Problems

134212222222222222.content: How about Olivia, then? Her dances are quite beautiful...not to mention her bare midriff...
134212222222222222.title: The Blushing Beauty?

choices: She hides you in her cleavage
1342122222222222221.content:
You wake up in what looks to be a tent. Everything around you -- the food, the supplies, the tent itself -- seems bigger than it as any right to be. Or...are you just...tiny? Last you remember, you'd been playing Fire Emblem Awakening on your 3DS...wait, maybe it was Fire Emblem Heroes on your phone...

Your thoughts are interrupted as a beautiful giantess enters the tent, weary from a day of helping her allies fend off invading forces. Her pink hair, wonderful eyes, slight blush, and especially her exposed stomach catch your attention. The outfit she's wearing definitely looks like the Performing Arts getup from Heroes. After a few seconds' gaze, you return to your senses only to find the towering woman's eyes looking right at you!

"What...huh?" The woman reacts. "A tiny person?"

"Um...h-hello..." is all you can stammer.

The giantess gently scoops you up into her hand, raising you to eye level. "How in the world did you become so small?"

"It's a long story...really hard to explain. You see, I -- "

"Olivia?" A male voice comes from outside. "Everything alright?"

Olivia sweats nervously -- she has to hide you! Who knows what could happen if a tiny person was discovered here and believed to be a spy?
1342122222222222221.title: Shall We Dance?

choices: Try to climb up her throat
No luck -- you get digested and absorbed.
13421222222222222212.content:
Just as she hears someone enter the tent, Olivia, without thinking, pops your tiny body into her mouth and closes her lips tight! You abruptly land on the soft, wet surface of her tongue and are too coated in saliva to get up, let alone escape from this hot, humid prison.

"Something wrong, Olivia?" The male whose voice was heard before asks.

Olivia lets out a delicate gulp before turning around. "N-nothing, Chrom! Just...recovering from a long day is all!"

"Alright, let me know if you need anything, OK?"

Chrom leaves the tent, apparently to check on his other troops. Olivia breathes a sigh of relief that her little discovery hadn't been...rediscovered. But as she remembers where she'd hidden said discovery, all the color fades from her face.

You, however, have it MUCH worse, being squeezed down the tight vertical tunnel of Olivia's esophagus before slipping through a small sphincter and finally falling onto the spongy floor of her stomach. The heat reminds you of hot springs (well, except that this heat is uncomfortable), and it smells of whatever Olivia had eaten...other than you. Despite the darkness of your organic prison, you can barely see the walls pulsating steadily, as well as a greenish lake of bubbling acids nearby.

So, how do you plan to get out of this?
13421222222222222212.title: Olivia's belly is much cuter on the outside...

choices: "I think a friend of mine can get you out of there..."
134212222222222222122.content:
Before you can even begin to plan an escape from Olivia's stomach, a sharp stinging sensation assails the skin of your right leg. The stomach acid!! Desperately, you pound your fists against the fleshy walls of your prison, but the pain brought by the digestive juices doesn't allow your struggles to last long. In one minute, your feet are just about dissolved, and in two, you fade out of consciousness...

...

After an uncertain amount of time, you slowly awaken to the surprising sight of the outside world. But...weren't you inside Olivia's belly? You try to run and seek help, but something seems to prevent you from moving an inch! Peering around in place, you can't see your arms...or your legs...or any part of your body! What the heck is going on?

"I'm so sorry, little man..." Olivia apologizes, tears in her eyes. "I panicked and didn't know where else to hide you!" The dancer puts a dainty hand to her belly and rubs its flat, soft surface gently.

Confused and frightened, you see and feel Olivia's hand rubbing you, while hearing a low gurgle from behind you. That's when the truth occurs to you.

"No..!" You panic mentally. "I've been digested and absorbed into her abs! Olivia! HELP ME!!"

In a last-ditch attempt to get your new host to notice your plight, you try to incite some movement but can only manage weak jiggling in the skin of her abs. Olivia's hand stops rubbing for a moment and she looks around, swearing she'd heard your voice.

"Little man? Is that you?" Olivia asks, regaining her composure.

"Y-yes, it's me..." you explain telepathically. "When I got digested inside your stomach, my soul seems to have been...transferred into your abs."

"M-my abs?!"

"Yeah...it's a little tight in here. And I feel so weird without my own body!"

The dancer stays silent for a good minute, giving deep thought to your predicament. She isn't sure how to restore you to normal, but she may know someone who could help with matters like this.

Having made up her mind, Olivia speaks.
134212222222222222122.title: Quality Time with Olivia's Abs

choices: ...sought out a dark mage for help.
...was pulled aside by a curious/nosy passerby
1342122222222222221221.content:
(Note: much of this chapter was written by doreedo, and it was edited with their permission.)

"I'm so glad you're okay... I'd feel terrible knowing that you died in there," she sniffs. Saying you were okay was a pretty big stretch, but you had retained your
conscience, so that was better than nothing at least. Olivia sniffled again before rubbing at her eyes to dispel the tears that had beginned to pool in them.

"...Alright! Just hold on tight, little guy! I'll get you out of there!"

"Wha- really?! You mean it?! You can bring me back to normal?!" You exclaim. That would be huge! You couldn't even put how much hope that instilled in you into words. You were overjoyed. Living your life as a part of someone else's body may not be your fate now.

High up above you, Olivia grimaced at your telepathically communicated words. She'd had no troubles hearing the joy in your words, and was feeling a little bad for just flat out telling you that she could help you. It wasn't a lie per se, it was just that she personally couldn't help you. But she did know a number of skilled mages! Surely one of them would be able to help the two of you out. And if Olivia was being entirely honest with herself, she really didn't want to go through her life with another person (much less a young man) merged with her body. Who knew how much he could actually see? Who knew how much he could actually do? He was- Oh!

Olivia's bare belly was jiggling almost impercetibly. She stared at the strange sensation with a squeak, looking with wide eyes at her reflection in a nearby mirror.

Yep, her tummy was definitely vibrating. Under normal circumstances it wouldn't have been a big deal, but her clothes left her midriff exposed... Oh, what would people say if they saw her like this? She couldn't stand to be the center of attention under normal circumstances; something like this was sure to draw people's eyes and questions!

Wringing her hands, Olivia shook in place as she wondered what to do. She just couldn't be seen like this, she just couldn't!

"S-stop it! Stop!"

*SMACK*

"Eek!" "Argh!" came the two exclamations of pain resulting from Olivia’s hard slap to her stomach. Though the sensation was thankfully brief, it hurt you enough that you were convinced to stop squirming within the dancer’s ab muscles.

With a hand to her tummy, your current host felt your tiny movements come to a halt and sighed with relief. As she exited her tent, Olivia...
1342122222222222221221.title: Don’t Squirm Too Much

1342122222222222221222.content:
"Wha...what?!" you react to your captor's words in a panic, jiggling her abs again.

"I'm sorry, but you just feel too good in there..." Olivia teases, patting her bare belly lightly. "Even if I wanted to get you out, I probably couldn't. You'll just have to stay and make my abs look good, I'm afraid! Now stop squirming for a bit, I have a performance coming up..."

Despite Olivia's warning, you keep jiggling the skin of your prison until the dancer silences you with a hard slap to her tummy. She holds her hand there for a moment to make sure you've stopped struggling, then makes her way onstage for her festival dance.

Being a powerless part of Olivia's abs makes her dance almost unbearable for you. Her motions rock you from one side to another again and again -- which feels even weirder since you don't have your own body anymore. The shakes of her hips make you dizzy rather quickly, and the sensation lasts for a good few minutes until your host finally completes her performance, bowing before an applauding audience and exiting stage right.

Now alone, Olivia caresses her stomach and whispers to you. "Thank you, little man! I hope you enjoy being in my abs...because you're never getting out of there."

Rubbing her belly once more, she makes her way to her quarters and lays down in her bed, tapping her stomach a few times before drifting off to sleep. With you, once a normal human being, now reduced to an unnoticeable contribution to her lovely abs...
1342122222222222221222.title: Staying with Olivia...Forever

13422.title: It's Fate(s)!

134221.content: So who's the lucky girl? How about Camilla?
134221.title: Yep

13422121.content:
After quite some time (you've lost track of time by now), you awaken in what looks to be a bedroom. It doesn't look at all like your own room. And everything's huge!

Or...are you just...shrunken?!

You are further surprised to see a large pair of eyes belonging to a character you recall from Fire Emblem Fates...Elise, the younger princess of Nohr. At your current size, Elise is practically a giantess to you!

But is it curiosity in her eyes, or playfulness? What she says clarifies the mystery nice and easy...
13422121.title: Tiny with Elise

134221212.content:
You ask her what spell she's talking about.
"I wanted to summon a little person! Why else would you be here?" That makes a lot of sense to you so you ask ner why she summoned you. "I don't know," she said, " I'm just kinda bored." You stare up at the giantess Elise. "Oh! I know, we can play Attack of the Giant Elise!"
134221212.title: "Yay! The spell worked!"

choices: You avoid Elise's wrath for a full minute
1342212121.content:
"Attack of the Giant Elise"? That's her idea of a game?! Despite being terrified on the inside, you feel you're in no position to argue with Elise.

"Alright," you sigh, "so how do we play?"

"Easy," the giantess replies, "you try to dodge my feet and hands as I try to crush you or grab you. If you manage to avoid me for one minute, I'll return you to normal size. But if I catch you..." Elise's stomach growls. "...you'll be with me for a long, long time!"

Wait a second. Elise wants to SWALLOW you? This is starting to become more of a life-or-death matter than a mere game.

Needless to say, you make a run for it.
1342212121.title: Attack of the Giant Elise

choices: You try to climb back up Elise’s throat
You try to escape the natural way
13422121212.content:
Your attempts to evade the giant Elise are quickly thwarted as her enormous yet dainty hand snatches you up, bringing you closer to her face. Her features are actually rather cute, even from your current viewpoint.

If only she didn’t want to eat you.

“Well, little man,” Elise teases you, “I caught you fair and square. And now, it’s snack time!”

With that, the immature Nohrian princess parts her lips and tosses you into the moist darkness of her mouth, her teeth closing behind you and preventing any form of escape. The slimy tongue then launches you into the lightless abyss of her throat, and you’re swallowed down with an effortless gulp. After sliding down the tight esophagus, you’re forced through a small sphincter and finally fall into a large, fleshy chamber with a wet plop. The walls are pulsating steadily, and a greenish lake bubbles with acid.

There’s no denying it: you’re inside Elise’s stomach!

Elise gives her belly a few gleeful pats. “Have fun in there while you can!” The Nohrian troubadour giggles, shaking her hips to toss you around within her gut. “Soon you’ll be a part of me...forever!”

Better think of a way out of here quickly, or you’ll end up as nourishment!
13422121212.title: A Trip to Elise’s Tummy

13422122.content: How about Hinoka, the elder princess of Hoshido?
13422122.title: Hinoka?

134221222.content: The younger princess of Hoshido?
134221222.title: Sakura?

1342212221.content:
You awaken in what appears to be a bedroom...a bedroom very different from your own. Also, everything looks HUGE! Or...are you just...small? You are further surprised by a pair of cute eyes looking down at you. These eyes belong to a young woman with pink hair, white and red clothing, and a magical rod. You quickly recognize her as Sakura, the younger princess of Hoshido in the 3DS game Fire Emblem Fates.

Before you can say anything, Sakura opens her mouth to speak...
1342212221.title: Sakura it is.

13422122212.content:
"I...I can't believe the spell worked!" Sakura smiles softly.

"Wha...huh?" You blink, wondering what in the name of rice is going on here.

"The thing is...I-I've always wanted a tiny man to play around with."

"WHAT?!"

"Y-yes...I know this might sound strange, but..."
13422122212.title: Sakura's Tiny Plaything

choices: Yes, you find a good spot to hide.
134221222121.content:
Your heart almost stops at the latest words to come out of Sakura's mouth. She's wondering how you taste?! At your size, the Hoshidan princess could easily swallow your puny body whole, right here and right now...but she seems to have something different in mind. Sakura retreats behind what appear to be a pair of shoji doors and, in roughly a minute's time, reenters the room wearing a new set of clothes -- a light pink robe, white leggings, and a set of fake...cat ears?! That must be the outfit Sakura wears during the Trick or Defeat event in Fire Emblem Heroes.

This...can't possibly end well for you, can it?

"Meow~" Sakura teases, crouching much like a cat. "We're going to play a nice game of cat and mouse! I'll give you twenty seconds as a head start..." Twenty seconds...how generous. "Better run, little mousey, or you just might end up as my snack!"

Normally, paralyzing fear would prevent you from moving a muscle in situations like this. However, inaction is tantamount to suicide here -- with this in mind, you turn and run for dear life, Sakura slowly and tauntingly chasing you on all fours, just as a real cat would enjoy playing with its prey.

Are you able to escape your pursuer?
134221222121.title: A Dangerous Game of Cat and Mouse

But who ends up finding tiny little you in Valentia?
1342221.title: Shrunken in the Kingdom of Valentia

13422211.content:
After quite the stint of unconsciousness, you slowly and groggily awaken to find yourself inside what looks to be a massive castle. Everything around you - the furniture, the windows, EVERY little detail - seems much bigger than it should be. No...you’ve just shrunk! One moment you were playing Fire Emblem Heroes on your phone, and now THIS happens.

You take a look around, noticing that you currently sit atop a wooden table. As you turn your head, you gasp at the sight of a massive woman’s face looking right at your tiny form!

“Relax, little one,” the woman says, “I won’t hurt you. I found you unconscious outside Valentia Castle and brought you here.”

Unable to work up the nerve to run for it, you simply stare and observe the giantess’s features: her beautiful red hair flows down her shoulders like a river of fire, complementing her regal white outfit and cape. Her eyes pierce right through you with a powerful yet kind gaze.

“My name is Celica. And you are..?”

Once you’re finally able to regain composure, you introduce yourself to Celica, who giggles at your shrunken voice, causing you to blush.

“Truth be told, I was surprised at first to see someone as small as you in this peaceful kingdom. But even Valentia can be dangerous for you, given your current size. I think it’s best if I hide you...”
13422211.title: Valentian Queen Celica

134222113.content:
...in her mouth? IN HER MOUTH?! Of all the possible hiding places, Celica chooses to stow you in her mouth?! You feel your blood run cold at her frightening idea of a safe spot. However, knowing Celica to be a caring, gentle soul, you doubt she’d actually swallow you down into her deadly stomach acids...

Not to mention the fact that you don’t have much of a choice in where you’re kept, what with you being roughly half an inch tall.

Lowering her head towards the table you currently stand upon, Celica tries to reassure you. “You’ll be safe. I promise! Now get in before someone sees you...”

The towering queen’s lips part, revealing the dark cavern of her mouth to you. Her teeth are perfect and pearly-white, contrary to your expectations of anyone in a pseudo-medieval setting. Her waiting, pink tongue is coated lightly in saliva, and as you start to nervously walk onto it, you can feel tiny bumps - taste buds - beneath your feet. Celica’s tongue is also very soft to tread on, but getting soaked in saliva is still an off-putting sensation.

With your tiny form now fully inside of her maw, the giantess returns to her normal position and closes her teeth and lips tight, sealing you in moist darkness. Before you can get your bearings, though, the slimy muscle below you shoves your miniscule body to the inside of Celica’s right cheek, uncomfortably pressing you to the fleshy wall. Is she tasting you? Another prod from the monstrous tongue leads you to believe so, and you vent your frustration by pounding your little fists on the flesh.

“Let me out of here!” you yell to your captress. “This feels disgusting!!” If you ever get out of this mess, you’ll definitely need a very long shower...

Celica puts a hand to her cheek, feeling the squirms of the small man crammed inside her mouth. She can still hear your tiny voice in there. Maybe this was a mistake?

As you continue to struggle and scream, a sudden loud noise assaults your ears. A noise that will determine your fate...
134222113.title: So Much for Inner Beauty...

choices: Apologize and beg Celica to spit you up
Try to escape via the throat or intestines
1342221132.content:
Before you can protest and fight any longer within the wet confines of Celica's mouth, her slimy beast of a tongue curls up slightly, causing you to unwillingly slide towards the pitch-black abyss ahead - no doubt her throat. With no energy left to resist the royal giantess, you allow your limp, exhausted body to slide down into Celica's esophagus with a powerful yet awkward swallow.

On the outside, the red-haired queen pats her chest a few times, presumably to speed up your descent, before tracing your journey down her neck with her index finger. It only takes seconds for Celica to feel your puny form drop into the depths of her belly, which she gives a gentle rub.

After being squeezed through a tight sphincter, you plummet into Celica's warm stomach with a splash. While it's difficult to see much in here, you're somehow able to notice the fleshy walls of your organic prison pulsate slightly, as well as traces of vegetables dissolving away in the greenish, bubbling lake of acid.

Wait a second...ACID?!

"You shouldn't have squirmed around in my mouth like that, little man!" Celica scolds you, her voice booming around you in every direction. "Perhaps a nice, long stay inside my body will teach you a lesson."

Pounding on the stomach walls is out of the question, since you've tired yourself out while thrashing in her mouth. Maybe you should apologize to Celica for your actions, and hope she lets you out? Or you could try to escape on your own, and hope you don't end up as nutrition for her...
1342221132.title: You're Very Tough to Stomach

141.content: She walks in and takes her clothes off, leaving her bra and panties. She lays down on the bed you are on, not realizing you are there. She traps you with her tail and falls asleep. You struggle to get out, and when you do, you move up to her face. She breathes on you. You decide to wake her up, since you think she will help. When she does, she sees you with a . . .
141.title: Waking up the female fox

1413.content:
Your heart nearly freezes in shock as the massive Vixen's eyes focus upon your tiny body. Strangely enough though, no ill will or bitterness befell her green orbs as they gaze upon your form. A few seconds of awkward silence pass by as you two continue to lock stares at one another. It wasn't until the massive blue furred giantess got the first word.

"Hello?" she asks in a soft, gentle tone with a small hint of confusion over your sudden appearance. The sound of her voice did manage to calm your shaking nerves slightly. If she did have any negativity towards your sudden arrival she surely would've acted out by now.

"H-hi." you meekly reply while giving a small hand wave to follow. Slowly, the great Vixen's head shifts slightly as her upper body gently rises up before her bed. With a small shift of her arm, she manages to rest her head against the palm of her hand under to gaze down upon you in a more relaxed position.

"What do you happen to be?" she asks curiously. "You certainly don't look like any being I've seen in the Lylat system." she admits while lowering her face to get a better vantage of your body. "Strange...no fur or snout at all. Do you happen to be some sort of ape?" the question alone did manage to spark a sudden realization in your brain. Everyone here must've been apart of some sort off anthropomorphic animal class. And judging by her curious natures, humans weren't on the list.

"Errr...sort of." you stammer, unsure just how to explain what exactly you were to her.

"Hmmm...you must be some kind of rare species I see!" she beams with a rather gentle smile on her face. "you must be. I mean, I've never seen such a creature so small before...not to sound rude that is." She quickly adds.

"N-none taken Mrs. fox." you reply.

"Please. Call me Krystal." she retorts with a small giggle.

"R-right Krystal." you nod your head pronouncing her name right away.

154331.content:
It was an unpleasant sleep. Very unpleasant. Maybe it's because you drank one too many energy drinks late in the night. Maybe it's because you stayed up way past proper sleeping time playing video games. Maybe it's because you stayed up for so long, that your body had to force itself to shutdown just for you to finally switch to sleep mode! Regardless of the reason, the sleep was uncomfortable and you had a nightmare about evil killer robots that wanted to take over the world and experiment on your vulnerable organic shell!

Although to be fair, you kinda recall hearing a really nice jazzy tune for the robotic overlords' anthem. Seriously, it was a very uplifting, tune sung by a very lovely voice that could really lift one's spirits despite even the worst kind of inhumane experimentation. ...Hm… how did it go again?

“NOBLE HALTMANN, WE ADORE HIM. NOBLE HALTMANN, WE ADORE HIM!” YEAH, that's it! “EVERYDAY… WE WISH…. HIM GLORY!” Yep, truly a catchy melody. Yep, this Haltmann fellow sure has some fine taste!

WAIT. ARE YOU STILL HEARING THE SONG?!

Migraine ignored, you wake up with a sudden jolt of shock and astonishment. You felt wide awake and up with the chickens, yet you still heard the alluring melody from your dream!
Not only that, you werent in your bedroom anymore. You find yourself trapped like a rat inside a huge stuffy glass container. You barely had enough air to breathe fine thanks to the tiny air holes from the lid up above!

As if being trapped inside a jar wasnt terrifying enough, the source of the melody came from the voice of the colossal red-haired figure not far from where you were. As she sings, you observe her more carefully. White astro helmet, white blazer top over a black dress, and um… hovering yellow gloves that seemed to act in sync with her body despite having no arms attached!

“S-S-S-SUSIE?!!” you blurted out louder than you had planned what with being so dumbstruck that you were staring at an enormous antagonist from one of your Kirby games! You covered your mouth, realizing way too late you screamed with shock a little too loud.

"WE IMPLORE YOU, DEAR HALTMANN! WE IMPLORE YOU, DEAR HALTMANN!" thankfully, she was too immersed in her song to notice your outburst. The gigantic alien/android(?) twirled about with her huge shiny blue eyes of her faceless face staring up to the heavens as she sang with all her heart and soul, "BLESS... OUR WORK... AND BE AT EASE!"

She certainly did have a wonderful singing voice, even if it's strictly meant for propaganda purpose. It surprising you werent wondering where the rest of the orchesta is coming from. What you SHOULD be wondering is how you ended up here the size of a bug and trapped in a giant mason jar. She must already be aware of your presence, since SOMEBODY put you in there.

Well you certainly had no interest in staying and seeing what fate the colossal robotic secretary has in store for you! You needed out and fast. You check your pockets in hope that you brought along SOMETHING to break the glass. Sadly you didnt have anything on you. Your only hope at the moment would be to kick the glass until it cracks!

So you delivered heavy kicks to the glass, hoping for at least a teensy crack to work with! A couple of tries, no luck. You kick some more. And kick some more!
“C'mon! C'mon!” you mutter to yourself, kicking and kicking over and over. Not even the teensiest sign of a crack. But you dont give up. Instead, you increase the tempo and strength, kicking as hard as you can! You kick and you kick until finally...
154331.title: The Sentient Soprano Secretary

Susie gives you a lifeless stare, her eyes showing no empathy for your situation. Her cheeks park up, and she happily approaches your glass prison. “Ah, you’ve finally awoke!”, she said, her large voice violently shaking your eardrums. “We’re you trying to escape?” You stutter before answering. “I- I was-“ Before you can finish, she raises a finger, waving it. “Tsk, tsk, tsk.” She said, with a sour tone in her voice. “Don’t lie to me. I know you were trying to escape.” She moves her hand over the jar and begins unscrewing the lid.

“For trying to escape, you must be punished.” She knelt down to make eye contact with you. “Unluckily for you, I already have an idea.” She stood up and looked down at you. “I think I’m gonna take you out of that jar.”, she said putting her hands at her waist and moving them down. “Instead...” She pulled her hands up to show a pair of pink panties. “You’re gonna live in here!” She then grabbed you and threw you into her panties before pulling them up to her crotch. 15521112.content:
You understand Palutena's words, but are struck silent by fear. The goddess looks down at you, shuddering in her palm, and you now see the worry in her face.

"You poor thing," she says. "We need to find a place to keep you safe!"

15521112.title: Palutena's Puny Pal

choices: After a few minutes, Palutena spits you back up.
A lot more than ten minutes pass...uh oh!
155211122.content:
Suddenly, a brief, yet thunderous rumble assaults your eardrums. Once it ceases, Palutena blushes in embarrassment and puts her free hand to her belly. She then smiles at you, having thought up an idea.

Maybe a risky idea...for YOU.

"You don't mean..." you begin, but are too afraid to continue.

"It seems that in order to protect you, I'll have to swallow you," says Palutena. "But if we want you to remain completely hidden from enemies, you'll have to undergo a minor change..."

"Change? As in...?"

Palutena uses her free hand to snap her fingers, and you suddenly feel...an odd sensation. Light engulfs you for a short while, and when all the hocus-pocus nonsense is done with, you feel at ease again...sort of.

"That should serve as the perfect disguise," comments Palutena telepathically. "You do look like a delicious little treat!"

You try to run, but quickly discover that you can't move an inch! Then it hits you...you've been transformed into a helpless piece of candy! Some disguise.

"Wait!" you panic telepathically. "Let's talk this over!"

"You'll be protected in my stomach," responds the goddess. "My powers of light will shield you from being digested for about...ten minutes."

"No, don't do this! Don't eat me!!"

But it's too late. Palutena parts her lips and places your candy body in the dark cavern of her mouth. Closing her lips, she uses her tongue to roll you around, apparently tasting you. But this doesn't last long - your captor's tongue flicks you into her throat, and like that, you're swallowed. One would be able to view a small lump - your sugary form - sliding down her throat until it disappears past her chest area.

It only takes you seconds to land in the slimy, warm, soft depths of Palutena's tummy. You are coated in saliva and paralyzed with horror. You don't plan on spending the rest of your life within the goddess of light...
155211122.title: Not the dinner you'd dreamed of...

1552111222.title: What is your fate?

15521112221.content:
If you had muscles in your candy form, you wouldn't be able to move them. Helpless, you watch as digestive fluids pour into your organic prison and begin to eat away at you. It takes mere minutes for the goddess's stomach acids dissolve you completely.

...

After several hours, you slowly awaken to the miraculous sight of the outside world! Did Palutena decide to free you and change you back to human form again?

...not even close.

The minute you try to run, you discover to your dismay that you can't move! Peering up, you see Palutena's face (upside down, from your viewpoint) smiling down at you. Then you feel her hand patting you, and the sensation is strange, to say the least.

"Sorry I had to digest you," teases the goddess, "but you were just too delicious!"

...oh snap.

It turns out that you've been absorbed into Palutena's abdominal muscles! Your physical, human body is gone, and your soul is trapped inside the torso of the Goddess of Light! Well, hopefully you'll be freed when she dies...

...wait, Palutena's immortal? She'll live forever?!

Well, this is gonna be a LONG eternity.
15521112221.title: Nourishment for the Goddess of Light

choices: Just relax and wait for breakfast.
15521112222.content:
In a quick instant, the gloomy organically belly of Hell itself changed into complete and utter darkness. Another quick instant, the complete and utter darkness faded and you found yourself back in your regular human form... but sitting in a rather small prison cell. The cell was well cleaned, nice beautiful white marble walls and flooring, plant life and little marble statues of the goddess set atop greek-style pillars, and a well organized bookshelf full of loads of books (none of them written in english, unfortunately), and a few decorative Mycenaen-style paintings, and a well lavished king sized bed, so it was a rather luxurious prison cell.

Admittingly, it was an infinitely better setting than Palutena's stomach (especially now that you were no longer a yummy piece of candy), but you still felt incredibly confined. There was no window to the outside (uh, if there was an outside to begin with) and the only way out was blocked by an out of place steel safety door with the door handle and lock on the opposite side. There was a small little window to see through but all you could make out that awaited beyond your cell was an empty hall of white walls.

"Where in the hell am I?" you wonder to yourself out loud. And in no time at all, the answer quickly came to you.

*Knock knock knock!* "Hello? Tiny friend of Lady Palutena? Are you awake?"

You quickly get up off your oh so comfy bed and rushed to the steel door and looked through the window. Behind your door stood what looked to be a chibi cartoony-style version of Palutena wearing coke-bottle glasses with swirls in them smiling back at you. Part of you thought you were having some sort of bizarre near-death hallucination from the lack of oxygen inside Palutena's tummy, but you were most definitely conscious.

"Good morning, tiny friend of Lady Palutena!" smiled the cartoony Palutena, "did you manage to get plenty of rest?"
You were in no mood to talk about your day or how your sleep was. You just wanted to cut right to the chase.

"Where am I?" you asked, "I thought I was in your... uh... Palutena's stomach just a minute ago."

"Technically you still are," she corrected, "this happens to be the storage area of Lady Palutena's stomach reserved for prisone-I mean special guests that her Lordship doesnt wish to be digested and absorbed as proper nutrition. For safe-keeping, if you will." Normally, you'd find this outrageously odd, but you remember the level where you end up in HADES' stomach, so you have to admit it makes sense. Besides, it's actually no stranger than most of the stories based on actual Greek mythology.

"I see," was all you could come up with responding.

"I'm one of Lady Palutena's loyal white blood cells, #338291!" she introduced herself, "I'm in charge of this storage facility withing her Lordship's stomach. I and my fellow white cell subordinates will make sure youre well protected and well looked after inside the belly of our Goddess."
"It's um... quite a nice place you got here," you admit, "it's very... cozy. But a little confined."
"Oh dont worry, I'm sure you'll get used to it," #338291 said with a smile, "this is the Top Level Max Security Unit of Solitary Confineme... I mean Luxury Suite reserved only for Lady Palutena's most important guests." Youre gonna pretend that didnt just creep you out a little.

"Well, listen, I really like this place, seriously I do," you tell her, "but I'm not really interested in staying. I would appreciate it if I was let out soon."

"Oh, I'm sorry we cant do that," the cartoony white blood cell said with a frown, "Lady Palutena said it's far too dangerous outside. What with Viridi declaring war on humanity, you wont last very long outside of her Lordship's body." Ok ok. You understand. She makes a good point. However, youre not gonna enjoy being couped in here for too long despite how fancy it looks.

"Ok, I see your point," you give her her propers, "but after that whole Viridi thing is settled, I'm free to go, right?"

"Oh no! Absolutely not!" #338291 shakes her head, "after Viridi is dealt with, my lady predicts that it'll be even more dangerous on the outside! She predicts that the end result of the war will attract a new war with the accursed Aurum followed by a hunt for the illusive Chaos Kin which escaped Viridi's Reset Bomb depot. And then there's a matter of dealing with Hades himself." Ah right. Just like in the game.

"Of course of course," you nodded, "then after that, I can go?"

Again, the blood cell shakes her head, "No, not at all. Then comes the earthly wars."
"Wait, what?" you squinted your eyes, "earthly wars?"

"Of course," she states, "the wars fought against those from the vast unexplored regions of the world. The parts of the world who worship heretical gods and unfamiliar deities." What?! This wasnt part of the game! "The first of many, her Lordship predicts, will be against the Empire of the Farsidians."

"The Farsidians?! What the hell are..." before you could even finish asking the question, the wheels in your head began to turn. You thought outside the box. Considering your knowledge of Greek history, you had a good guess. "...are you talking about the Persians?!"
"No. The FARSIDIANS," she corrected you, "the prediction says it may take at least half a century (like the actual Greek-Persian wars), so please bare with us."

Your jaw dropped.

"HALF A CENTURY?!" you shouted with disbelief, "youre telling me I have to sit in here for half a century?!"

"No, it's possibly much longer than that," she continues. "let's see..." she puts a finger to her chin and looks upward, "...the predication says the next earthly war will be against the great Moran Empire."
"...The Roman Empire?" you groaned.
"No, the MORAN Empire," she corrected, "hm... that'll be followed by a civil split, possible influence to a faith taught by a carpenter (yeah, THAT one), I think it'll be safe enough to leave by then."
"Uh, but-"
"No, wait! I was wrong!" she wasnt done yet, "if I remember correctly, what comes next is Round 2 with the descendants of the Fasidians... Oh oh oh!! Then that's when the REALLY bad earthly wars start!!"
Your heart sank, having a good idea what she's talking about "Please dont tell me youre talking about..."

"The Agrabahian conquest under the Omayuud Paliphate!"
You gritted your teeth with sheer irritation. "The Arabian conquest under the Umayyad Caliphate?"
"Please stop interrupting me," she politely scolds you, "there's a few Agrabahian wars there alone! Omayuud... Bassabid (Abassid), Taminid (Fatimid), then the Yuyyubid sultanate (Ayyubid sultanate) those might take a while to deal with. Very vicious warriors, I heard."

You lowered your head as you rubbed that aching migraining side, "...Then what?"

"Let me think..." she scratches her chin, "..ah! Our final stand with the Awesomans! I think everything will finally be peaceful and quiet by then." No it wont. It most certainly wont. Not for the Palutenians. Not that it matters for you anyway. "So let's see... by my estimates, it should take no later than 2000 years for your immediate release!"

This was not funny anymore.

"I'm pretty sure I'm going to be dead long before then!"

"Then I certainly hope you'll enjoy your stay for the remainder of your lifetime!" she said with a sweet smile, "now if you'll excuse me, I will summon your morning breakfast over! Please let us know immediately if you'd like anything else!"
"I'D LIKE TO LEAVE!" you shouted
"I'm sorry, we dont serve any of that," she gave no fs as she trotted off with a spring in her step.

And once again you were alone. No companionship. Just a cozy bed and a ton of books you cant read to pass the time. This clearly cant be your fate! All you wanted to do was play a game and THIS is what you get?! Somebody needs to sue the crap out of Nintendo!

You sighed hard and lied down in your incredibly comfy bed, wondering what you should do...
15521112222.title: Prisoners of Luxury

choices: Go for it! Break that window!
You're caught before you can do any more damage
155211122221.content:
Ever determined to get the heck out of Palutena's stomach, you begin to formulate an escape plan, quickly noticing a tiny crack in the small window of your prison cell. Peeking over at the bookshelf, you snag one of the books...and fling it right toward that window!

No dice.

However, the crack in the window seems to have gotten a bit bigger. You pick the book back up again and throw it at the window another time...and another...and another. That window should be ready to shatter with one more impact from the book...

...but do you dare take the opportunity to escape? If Palutena finds out about this, she'd digest and absorb you for sure!
155211122221.title: Escaping Palutena's Innards

1552112.content:
"...Slave."

The word slips from between her lips like a serpent. When juxtaposed against the soft features of her face, it feels incredibly odd. Despite its massive size, Palutena's body bears all the beauty and dignity of a Renaissance sculpture - but exploding with life and energy. Her dress flutters and ornaments tingle together with each great step across the stone. Her ample bosom, wrapped in fine fabrics, wobbles gently, showing their weight. Faint, sweet fragrances float into your nose.

Yet, despite the refined surroundings and the sophisticated air, Palutena doesn't show any sign of haughtiness or malice. The complete opposite, actually - the wide-stretching smile and round eyes carry a casual nature, as if she were speaking to a friend. As she approaches, the full details of her body becoming clearer, it seems like the goddess of light is a little confused by your reaction. Like declaring you her servant was a completely natural thing.

With a little shrug, she finally comes up to the side of your cushion, looking down. Her crotch area is level with your platform, a glimpse of her leg peeking out below. After a moment of scrutinizing your body, she lets out a little laugh. A massive arm reaches down, pointing a slender finger towards you.

"Well? Kneel before me, mortal."

You're unable to do anything but stand dazed, taking a quick step back. It's still very hard to register all of Palutena at once. From the white cloths stretching around her mountainous torso, up to the round curve of her pinkish, bare shoulders, and the acres of fluttering green hair, the deity overwhelms you. Each subtle movement is completely apparent. Blinking, she kneels down slightly, waving the huge finger at you. It's nearly your size.

"The goddess of light commanded you to kneel, and she doesn't perceive much kneeling down there. Has the All-seeing Eye of Palutena gone blind?"

Her index finger and thumb wrap around your chin. You're surprised at the care she's putting into this movement - it feels soft to the touch. They slowly move downwards, stroking your body gently. The tips go over the curves in your torso, squeezing it gently as if to feel it up. You can't help but blush a little at the movement - causing her to laugh. As the slender pillars of flesh and muscle wrap around you, they feel warm as clothes from the drier. Now, she gently brushes her pinky finger over your head.

"Or perhaps her slave isn't in a worshiping mood? Don't worry, Palutena is always willing to help humans."

Suddenly, the finger presses down with immense, crippling force on your head. Almost instantaneously, your collapse under its pressure, brought to your knees and hands. It feels like your spinal cord is ready to break. You try to look up to read the goddess' expression, but the strong finger presses down on your neck each time, tilting it to the sheets. You whimper gently under the sharp pain. Your arms start to get sore from the weight she's applying.

With one quick movement, the finger slides off the bed - essentially flicking you to the ground. You look up at the enormous woman. She leans over your body with a hand to her hip, lifting an eyebrow. All the decorations on her robes clash together, making gentle chiming sounds. Her legs are wrapped with the straps of a her footwear - she wears a white sock under one, while the other is bare underneath. Palutena moves the latter foot towards you.

Your senses returning, you dart away. With a quick glance back, her expression has changed from joy to exasperation and disappointment. The footsteps echo close behind - her leg movements don't look particularly strong, but each step nearly sends you flying up from the ground. After a quick scan around the elegant room, you spot a hiding place - under the bed. And soon, it seems like you might actually make it underneath...

A flick of the wrist. A gentle hum behind you. You duck. Palutena's scepter comes flying from the door, swiftly swiping away the bed's legs. The entire structure groans for a moment, before falling down. From your perspective, it lands inches away; the tremendous amounts of shaking and noise toss you on your back. You make an attempt to get to your feet- but, with a snap from Palutena's fingers, you find yourself floating inches above the ground. Your legs are unable to do anything but move desperately as the woman approaches, a hand on her cheek. Her gaze looks fairly aloof, eyebrows in a flat line, frowning in disgust.

Evidently, your display didn't impress the goddess.

"Millions of mortals for me to torment - er, bless with my presence - and fortune chooses you. Why would fortune choose someone so unskilled with worship? Maybe I've plucked up a little non-believer? Someone with no idea what I can do? I should just snuff you out. There are plenty of humans down there. Nobody will miss one or two."

With a slight twist of the ankle, her leg lifts into the air. The brown sole of her shoe is completely clean and smooth. Palutena's spell fades, and you drop to the ground - her heel following close after, pinning your body to the ground. The blunt force drains the wind from your body, leaving you gasping and squirming. You struggle against it, but she just presses harder, squeezing your spirit out. If she keeps up, your chest will collapse...

"Still..."

She hums a little, grinding her heel down.

"I *do* enjoy teaching haughty humans their place, and seeing their pride turn to humility and shame. Thus, the Goddess Palutena blesses you with a second chance. Kiss my foot."

As the brown wall lifts off you, you let your breath return to you. Knowing the price for delay, you immediately leap to your legs. The shoe floats just above your head. With only a second of hesitation, you leap upwards, wrapping your arms around the shoe, and kiss it profusely. The taste isn't particularly agreeable, but fear of your mistress' wrath floats over you - so you continue kissing.

Suddenly, her foot shakes a little, wobbling out of your reach. You fall a slight distance from it. Palutena now looks absolutely furious - you didn't do a good job, it seems. Knowing that you can't escape, you simply stare upwards and beg as the goddess slams her giant foot down next to you. The force is even greater than the bed's collapse. Her glare floats over your pathetic body, followed by her sole.

A sly smile creeps across her face. Slowly, her narrow eyes widen again, only to close in happiness as a chuckle erupts from her mouth. It eventually transitions to full-out laughter. The goddess of light suddenly collapses to the bed, giggling madly. Leaning over the side of the bed, her grinning face looms over you, speaking with a noticeably louder tone:

"Ahah, you actually fell for it! 'Kiss my foot' - seriously, who says that?"

Noticing your gaze, she coughs a little, waving a hand.

"Sorry, sorry - but I can't help it! I didn't think I could pull off an evil goddess routine, but look at you - squirming like a little Nettler! Well, I shouldn't be so surprised - blood relative of Medusa and all."

Apparently, putting you in a close encounter with death is this woman's idea of comedy?

Twirling her hand around casually, you find yourself magically lifted off the ground, and carefully deposited on the white pillow. Palutena, lying on her back, looks at you, her massive, beautiful face upside-down.

"Aw, did I go a bit overboard there? You look pretty shaken. I didn't mean to hurt you, little one! Let me make it up to you."

She reaches her hand to the side of the pillow, like a platform. Taking careful steps, you move over to it, feet sinking into the small wrinkles in her flesh. Gently, she wraps her hands around you in a warm caress. Her hands bring you over her face, before letting go. You find yourself floating to her massive lips - fear takes you again for a moment, before a sense of relaxation comes over your body. Her soft, pink lips wrap around you, giving an ever-so-gentle kiss that covers your whole face with moistness.

A hand snatches you from the air, moving you against her massive breasts. You find yourself inside the soft confines of her cleavage, spreading like mountains on either side of you. Her hand comes down to pat you, stroking your body, fingers running down your back and body. Despite the constant movement, it's almost relaxing - like a massage. The warmth from her bust and the rhythmic sound of her breathing help to calm your nerves. Slowly, you find your shaking calmed, as you rest in her bosom.

"I hope this helps. Poor thing."

Both hands squeeze softly against you in a massive cuddle. The Goddess of Light engulfs you in a hug. The sound of her gentle sighs and faint, sweet odor wash over you, surrounding you with... Palutena-ness. It's wonderful. As her warm arms move away, you reach out, trying to get them back. In return, you hug her chest.

"Everything better now?"

You look up, to see her face looming above, a quiet, concerned pout on her lips. You nod.

"Okay. Ready for your next task, slave?"

You stare blankly at her for a moment. Didn't she just apologize for her behavior? You couldn't understand this. Seeing your expression, the comparatively huge woman puts a hand on her mouth, smiling.

"Oh, did I forget to say? You're still my slave. I don't exactly want to do this, but - you see, goddesses can't really live without some worship. And when I look at Earth, I don't exactly see many people making sacrifices to Palutena. So, you'll be my food source."

Considering her smile, you can't tell how true that is. It seems like she's enjoying you quite a bit.

"But to make it nicer, you can choose how to worship me! What would you like?"
1552112.title: In Palutena's Service

choices: "Good job slave, now it's time for something a bit different!" (Reader's choice)
"Good job slave, I think you deserve a rest in my shoe!"
15521121.content:
As you stare up at Palutena, you try to process what's just happened to your life. Everything you've prepared for and everything you've known has been replaced with the idea of worshiping a gigantic woman who may or may not want to crush you, you certainly don't trust her yet! But then again, you remember her calming scent and gentle kiss...

“Boom, boom, boom!”

Your thoughts are interrupted by the pounding vibrations of the goddess tapping her right food impatiently as she waits for you to make your decision. You still remember when you were sure that she was about to snuff you out under her heel, desperately kissing her-

“Hey, I may be immortal but I won't have you wasting my time, how do you want to worship me?”

Startled by her voice booming from above, you blurt out the first thing on your mind.

“Your foot!”

Almost immediately you wish you could take back your words, as you imagined once again being under her leather heel, one twist away from death. Palutena raises an eyebrow as she pulls you a bit further away from her bust.

“Oh? Didn't get enough last time huh? Very well, honestly I was a little worried you'd choose something indecent, but it's good to see you're a human who understands their place, you'll be an excellent source of worship for me!”

She closes her fingers around you, blotting out the light and pressing your face up against her fragrant skin, your fear about what is going to happen to you is mitigated by the calming smell that seems to naturally spill off of her. You soon feel yourself moving again, and a sudden change of pressure as the hand seems to descend to the ground, and sure enough her fingers release you, causing you to suddenly tumble onto the hard floor.

You quickly look up, the sky has been replaced with the bottom of a table, Palutena leaning under it as her hand lifts away from you. She smiles warmly as her hand makes some motions, and with a few sparkles the straps on her right heel snap away, and she pulls her foot free, stretching her toes out as she enjoys the cool palace air.

“Alright slave, there's a pillow next to you, bring that over here so I don't need to rest my foot on the cold floor!”

You turn to look behind you and sure enough there is a giant (to you) white pillow with gold trip on the ground. Realizing you won't have a chance to escape yet, you hurry behind it and begin pushing with all your might, managing to move it under the divine ped. Without fanfare it plummets onto the pillow heel first, proudly displaying the massive sole to you, the toes scrunch all at once and then relax, and Palutena sits up, her face and bust disappearing behind the table that has become your sky, her dress billowing about her her legs like a graceful cloud as she adjusts herself.

“Good job with the pillow slave, as a goddess I'm too busy to spend all day watching a little mortal like you, but don't worry, I'll make sure you always stay close by.”

In another sparkling gleam of light, you suddenly feel something around your neck, and instinctively grab at it, discovering something hard and cold. You do your best to look down and find a gold collar that extends on a golden chain, which itself is connected to an anklet that has appeared on your master's foot.

“This way no matter where I go you'll always be with me, I'm *sure* you're also glad that there's no chance you'll get away...er...get separated from my feet. Now get a move on with the worship, don't be shy!”

Realizing that any attempt at escape is now impossible, and feeling more than a bit annoyed about how you're now expected to kiss the feet of your kidnapper, you nonetheless know what you have to do. Walking over to her gigantic pale sole, you're struck by just how clean it is, not a single speck of dust, well, she is a goddess. The same comforting smell is here too, but it is joined with a distinct musk, having been in those heels probably didn't help.

Not wanting to be berated by the goddess, you delay no longer and begin kissing her sole, peppering it with quick pecks. You're pleasantly surprised again at just how soft and warm her skin is, and without thinking begin to lick. She scrunches her toes, wrinkles appearing in the perfect skin as you industriously move your tongue against it, and you climb up onto the pillow in order to be better able to reach the ball of her foot, hopping up against her instep. Her foot gently sways from side to side, pivoting on her heel as you work.

“Make sure to get between my toes, you can't be doing a lousy job your first day right?”

She leans her foot down a bit further, and you scramble up the back of it, facing her flawless toenails that sparkle just a bit in the ambient light under the table. You quickly lower your head between them and begin licking them with all your might, shrugging off the sudden increase of musky odor that hits you as you do. They stretch out, affording you more room to lean into the crevices between them, occassionally relaxing and clamping your face gently between them.

After at least twenty minutes of crawling over her feet and licking every last inch of them, from her pillowy toes to her solid heel, you hear her speak up again...
15521121.title: Way to put her foot in your mouth!

155211212.content:
"Good job slave, I think you deserve a rest in my shoe!"

You suddenly feel pressure removed from your neck. The collar dissipates into a flash of light, which scatters around the air. High above, Palutena leans back and yawns, brushing slender finger through her hair. It comes out as an ear-splitting roar. As she reclines, you can see her white dress fluttering above, against the table. Her feet, still moist from your saliva bath, tilt backwards - before, in one sudden motion, she slams them down onto the pillow. The impact sets you off your own own feet - you find yourself on your back, staring up at the divine woman's face.

Palutena peeked down at you. Her soft bosom swayed gently with her robes, as her massive face leaned in to get a better look at her worshiper. One hand rested on her lap, the gold ornaments chiming against each other. Her eyebrows have turned upwards slightly, and there's a strange smirk across her face, gleaming with satisfaction.

One great hand reaches down, swooping you into the sky. She cups it, letting it act like a little bed. Your head rests on your fingers - if you look down, you can see her shoe's mouth open on the floor far below. Did she really intend to put you in there?

A chuckle from Lady Palutena brings your attention back to her.

"Don't worry, slave. It's my duty to protect humans."

Her hand floats a little closer to her face, as the hand squeezes you gently.

"And I understand that humans are pathetic, fragile creatures that just fall apart into little teensy pieces if you push on them even slightly too hard..."

On this, her thumb taps you on the head, a little bit more roughly than usual. She lifts another hand to her mouth to hide a laugh.

"...Just like retractable pencils! I want to make sure you have a nice, relaxing break, so you don't break!"

Suddenly, her hand slides into a steep slope over her shoe. You struggle to hold onto the flesh, but the flawless surface left no folds to grab on. You soon find yourself dropping, hurdling towards the ground. The details of the room whir past your face into an incomprehensible blur of white and gold.

Before, suddenly, you stop. You float in midair for a moment, a light aura surrounding you. Palutena's using the power of flight to help complete your journey into her shoe. Far above, she grins to herself, as if your initial reaction from the drop amused her.

Finally, you land on her insole. Your backside falls into a faint imprint of her heel. A little further in, the brownish material is worn down in the shape of her toes - from this, you can see the footwear has been fitted perfectly to the shape of Palutena's sole. Her heels mean that the whole surface is sloped downward. Hints of the musky odor from before float around. If you were to lie down, it would be able to comfortably hold your whole body, with some of the loose straps covering most of your torso. The straps that once went up her knees now lie haphazardly across the marble flooring.

Palutena seems to be folding her kneesock into an even, rectangular shape. Looking over you, she turns her head away, as if the goddess of light was slightly embarrassed.

"This won't be permanent, of course - unless you want it to be. Rack up points with the goddess of light, and you'll be able to gain something a bit more glamorous. A nice bed, your own little room, or a chance to sleep on my body, perhaps? Something befitting of your status as Palutena's worshiper."

Green eyes twinkling, she puts one finger on her cheek, winking. Suddenly, that finger starts making complicated twists above your body.

"However, try to disobey me again, and..."

An odd tingling arises from your chest. Suddenly, the ceiling seems just an inch higher. Your breaths become shallow - and even quiet sounds seem to echo in the back of your head. The shoe's insole below you seems softer, but the sides seem to stretch further away.

You're shrinking.

The traces of moisture soon become puddles, wetting your feet. The straps around extend like roadways. Walls and decorations in the room, including the table and bed, become nothing but a memory, outside your field of view. As you shrink smaller and smaller, the puddles become rivers, and raging oceans, dragging you in. The shoe becomes its own world.

You can still recognize the unbelievably strong voice above:

"...I'll make your entire existence a nightmare."

Her face looms right above the shoe, bearing an innocent smile wide enough to swallow thousands of people in a nibble. It's soon replaced with a wall of flesh, as the ball of her foot hovers over the shoe, sliding in and trapping you inside.

With one blink, it all disappears. You're back to 4 inches tall, resting in her shoe. The room still spins around a few times before you can get your bearings.

Still holding the same expression as always, Palutena tosses her kneesock to you, folded in the shape of a bedsheet. With one last glance towards you, she steps away, calling over her shoulder.

"Now, I have some - er, some important affairs to handle. Goddess stuff, you know. Sleep well, slave!"

The woman twirls her finger one last time, attaching a new shoe to her sole. She leaves for the room's door, far in the distance. You can hear her footsteps echoing until she exits.

Her sock's fabrics, too, hold that welcoming smell. You can't tell what they're made of, but at this size, you can see the pattern on it quite clearly. Whoever made these knew what they were doing. After spending all that time with worship, you decide regaining some energy would be wise. The materials wrap around your body, and you slowly float into sleep.

***

Strange images swirl through your dreams. Some of life before Palutena - memories of friends and family. Others predictions of what might be to come. At some moments, the woman treats you gently, giving beautiful, sparkling gifts and otherworldly experiences; only to take them away the next second, berating you for messing up something you didn't understand. Her footsteps keep on echoing - she's chasing you. No matter which way you turn, she's in every direction; sometimes with a disappointed frown, other times with a carefree smile, or a concerned gaze. Soon, even your legs stop moving - you fly through the sky, unable to control yourself. The path of flight leads you to the goddess of light herself - swirling around her arms and legs, bouncing off her backside, then her chest, then her nose. You pause in front of her eyes, before floating away.

As she becomes more distant, the world around changes from a vague void to something breathing and living. A village bustling with life, peasants moving around this way or that. You could swear they look like some of your companions - in fact, the geography very closely resembles your hometown, with much more marble and less development. In the center, Palutena, taller than any building, leaning down. You can't see what she's doing, but people are moving around her chaotically. You fly closer in, trying to get a sense of her actions. The last image you see is her face, looking at you with an indecipherable expression.

***

It's become dark. You're still in the shoe, the giant room spread out all around. No signs of anyone around.
155211212.title: If the shoe fits...

choices: A little expedition wouldn't hurt. You have energy to spare.
Play it safe. You need your energy up for whatever Palutena has in store.
1552112122.content:
There was nothing. Well, nothing except the faint scent of Palutena and the darkened room around your little shoe room.

Sighing, you sit up in your makeshift bed and stare at whatever your eyes could make out in the dark room. Some bits of furniture, a standing glass light, the edge of the table Palutena sat at while you worshiped her foot...

Right. Her.

You didn't quite know what to do. Everything just...happened so quickly and without warning, you haven't really had the time to let it sink in. You haven't had the time to sit and think about it. A slave? You're a slave given the 'honor' of worshiping the goddess of light...? It didn't feel right. Then again, most people don't play a game and get taken into a video game.

You shake your head. It felt surreal, so much so that even with what you've just gone through, along with those dreams, it felt that you would wake up in your bed at your house and it would all be a memory.

You lay your head down against the soft insole of the shoe and feel a twinge of uneasiness. Palutena's scent faintly emanated from the sock-sheet and insole. Did she really intend to keep you like this? Sure, she nearly killed you, passing it off as humor, forced you to worship her, chained you to her foot, emphasized your helplessness and is forcing you to sleep in her shoe with the threat of your life becoming a terror if you try to run again due to her whims, but she comforted you. She held you against her in a hug to help you calm down after her, made sure you didn't die from falling from her hand, and even made a bed-sheet out of her sock for you.

All throughout your thoughts however, one thing kept coming back, one item still lingered; Palutena's smell. It was comforting, too much so. It almost felt imprisoning withing the shoe. You need to get out of here, just to the outside of the shoe so you can get some air that isn't infused with her scent.

It didn't take that long to get out of the shoe, but just as you set foot on the ground below, the twinge of uneasiness came back again. If you didn't get back in the shoe before she came back, would she take this as an escape attempt? Her attitude was unpredictable. It didn't help that some of her words and actions still haunt you. 'Millions of mortals to torment...there's no chance you'll get away...' A lot of what she's done hasn't made sense. Sure the slips she's said could be serious, but what if she's just playing with you? After all, she was close to killing you and laughed it off. It could be a prank.

It didn't sit well with you. Especially when she...shrunk you down even further. That was terrifying.

You began walking away from the shoe, far enough away so you wouldn't have to be around her aroma anymore. What did want with you? Just as a worshiper so she can 'feed' off of you? Or something else entirely...?

Well...whatever the reason, you're stuck here, for better or worse. At least until you can find a way to leave for good.

Now that Palutena's aroma wasn't around you as heavily (since it seems that the whole room smelled like her, just to a much lesser degree), you take another look around the dark room.

Everything was just as dark as it was a few minutes ago. From what little you can make out, it seems she left you here in the room.

A small spark within you began to flare up. It wouldn't hurt to take a look around would it? With how dark the room is, it couldn't be more than 3:00AM. You could just explore the room for a bit then retire to the shoe to see if sleep will come to you again. On the other hand, you don't want to get caught. Palutena could very easily interpret this as escaping, and if she means what she said, your life will be an experience you would want to end.
1552112122.title: Dueling with Unpleasant Thoughts

choices: "Are you trying to sneak an early breakfast?"
15521121221.content:
Having made up your mind, you walk around the room. It can't hurt to explore a bit before returning to Palutena's shoe, right? However, all you see in the faint light are a spare shield, an extra staff, and...a cookbook.

Lame.

However, as you're about to give up your search for interesting stuff, you turn around and see a bookcase full of...well, books. Books rather large compared to your tiny form. Curious, you approach the great case and scale the wood all the way to the highest shelf, pausing to rest your tired body. Once you've regained your stamina, you pull on the nearest book with all your strength...only to be nearly crushed as the book begins to fall off the shelf, taking you with it!

Bracing yourself for what may be the end, you close your eyes and say a quick prayer, and...SPLAT!

...wait.

You open your eyes, and feel around yourself...you're not dead! Perhaps the pages of the now-open book broke your fall! Whew.

Unable to hide your newfound interest in this book, you look down at the page you'd landed on. It seems to depict some kind of portal...below this image are instructions on how to travel to...other dimensions? Maybe this could be your ticket out of --

"SLAVE!!"

Ohhhhhh snap. Guess you made Palutena mad...better hope she doesn't think you're trying to make a run for it!
15521121221.title: A Possible Means of Escape..?
